{{cpp/thread/latch/title|wait}}
{{cpp/thread/latch/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
void wait() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Blocks the calling thread until the internal counter reaches {{c|0}}. If it is zero already, returns immediately.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
(none)

===Exceptions===
Throws {{lc|std::system_error}} with an error code allowed for mutex types on error.
